name: Brain Brooch
description:
Would you like some slimy brains with that?
This felt brooch is the ideal compliment for the modern zombie.
Hand stitched.

name: Zombie Hand Finger Puppet
description:
"Brainsssss.... BRAINNNNSSSSS!!!"
This fun finger puppet can be enjoyed by kids of all ages!
Made with green felt and hand stitched, this is an awesome gift idea.



NOTE: Some products may currently out of stock so may need to be remade before it can be posted. If this is the case please allow 1-2 days on top of delivery time estimate.

name: Eye Brooch
description:
This creepy eye will compliment any outfit!
Handmade with felt and all details carefully hand stitched.
Available eye colours are Green (as pictured), Blue or brown.
Approximately 4cm in diameter and features a silver brooch back on the back.
